Being a member of the lineage is beneficial, you have a lot of support from often rich and powerful people. Lineages have their rules, codex and leadership. It does not take much to start a lineage. But, it takes a lot of time to make the lineage big. Often few hundreds of years. Through that time you constantly have to prove and improve your lineage so it shows up an as glorious through the history. They keep track of all the people they got, what they did, when they were born, died, etc. And by starting a lineage you get the founder status, you will be remembered as the founder of the lineage, as a great person. Lineages arrange marriage for young grown ups so everyone gets married in a good family. Dowry for a young woman is a great way to arrange them, every lineage wants their women to be married in good and wealthy families.
